title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Mon Feb 26, 2018 | 7:12am EST Editors Choice Pictures 
Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Close 1 / 24 
Nearby residents Lizzie Varda, 16, and her mother Kathy Varda take part in a vigil led by the Junior Newtown Action Alliance to mourn students and teachers lost in a mass shooting in Florida's Stoneman Douglas High School, in Newtown, Connecticut.... more Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 Nearby residents Lizzie Varda, 16, and her mother Kathy Varda take part in a vigil led by the Junior Newtown Action Alliance to mourn students and teachers lost in a mass shooting in Florida's Stoneman Douglas High School, in Newtown, Connecticut. REUTERS/Michelle McLoughlin Close 2 / 24 
Hindu devotees take part in the religious festival of Holi inside a temple in Nandgaon village, in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Hindu devotees take part in the religious festival of Holi inside a temple in Nandgaon village, in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi Close 3 / 24 
A young priest throws a snow ball during a heavy snowfall in Saint Peter's Square at the Vatican. REUTERS/Max Rossi Reuters / Monday, February 26, 2018 A young priest throws a snow ball during a heavy snowfall in Saint Peter's Square at the Vatican. REUTERS/Max Rossi Close 4 / 24 
Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan performs in the figure skating gala of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan performs in the figure skating gala of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson Close 
Callum Smith in action with Nieky Holzken in Nuremberg, Germany. REUTERS/Ralph Orlowski Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 Callum Smith in action with Nieky Holzken in Nuremberg, Germany. REUTERS/Ralph Orlowski Close 6 / 24 
A woman takes part in a demonstration demanding justice for the female victims of violence in Mexico, in Mexico City. The words read: 'And if I disappear today, what would they say about me tomorrow?'. REUTERS/Edgard Garrido Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 A woman takes part in a demonstration demanding justice for the female victims of violence in Mexico, in Mexico City. The words read: 'And if I disappear today, what would they say about me tomorrow?'. REUTERS/Edgard Garrido Close 7 / 24 
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu looks at a pineapple presented to him by Israeli youth movement members at the start of the weekly cabinet meeting at the Prime Minister's office in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Gali Tibbon/Pool Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu looks at a pineapple presented to him by Israeli youth movement members at the start of the weekly cabinet meeting at the Prime Minister's office in Jerusalem. REUTERS/Gali Tibbon/Pool Close 
Demonstrators scuffle with police during an anti-fascism demonstration in Milan, Italy. REUTERS/Massimo Pinca Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 Demonstrators scuffle with police during an anti-fascism demonstration in Milan, Italy. REUTERS/Massimo Pinca Close 9 / 24 
Villagers holding torches parade around a village as part of their Lunar New Year celebration to pray for good fortune, in Jinjiang, Fujian province, China. REUTERS/Stringer Reuters / Monday, February 26, 2018 Villagers holding torches parade around a village as part of their Lunar New Year celebration to pray for good fortune, in Jinjiang, Fujian province, China. REUTERS/Stringer Close 
Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Artists perform during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Christian Hartmann Close 11 / 24 
Diego Schwartzman of Argentina celebrates after winning his final match against Fernando Verdasco of Spain at the Rio Open. REUTERS/Sergio Moraes Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Diego Schwartzman of Argentina celebrates after winning his final match against Fernando Verdasco of Spain at the Rio Open. REUTERS/Sergio Moraes Close 12 / 24 
Policemen react after a protester threw a stone from Notre Dame Cathedral compound in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo. REUTERS/Goran Tomasevic Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Policemen react after a protester threw a stone from Notre Dame Cathedral compound in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo. REUTERS/Goran Tomasevic Close 
Fireworks explode during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Pawel Kopczynski Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Fireworks explode during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Pawel Kopczynski Close 14 / 24 
A participant prepares backstage before the final show of the Miss Jumbo 2018 at a department store in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 A participant prepares backstage before the final show of the Miss Jumbo 2018 at a department store in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Close 15 / 24 
People visit the site of the assassination of Russian opposition leader Boris Nemtsov as they mark the third anniversary of Nemtsov's death, with the St. Basil's Cathedral seen in the background, in central Moscow, Russia. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 People visit the site of the assassination of Russian opposition leader Boris Nemtsov as they mark the third anniversary of Nemtsov's death, with the St. Basil's Cathedral seen in the background, in central Moscow, Russia. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Close 16 / 24 
French President Emmanuel Macron holds a young goat as he visits the 55th International Agriculture Fair in Paris, France. REUTERS/Thibault Camus/Pool Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 French President Emmanuel Macron holds a young goat as he visits the 55th International Agriculture Fair in Paris, France. REUTERS/Thibault Camus/Pool Close 17 / 24 
Ivanka Trump and Kim Yong Chol of the North Korea delegation at the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Ivanka Trump and Kim Yong Chol of the North Korea delegation at the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson Close 
Pita Taufatofua of Tonga during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Pita Taufatofua of Tonga during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Close 19 / 24 
Special forces of Belarusian Defence Ministry pose for a photo as they mark the Defender of the Fatherland Day at the 'Stalin Line' memorial near the village of Goroshki, Belarus. REUTERS/Vasily Fedosenko Reuters / Saturday, February 24, 2018 Special forces of Belarusian Defence Ministry pose for a photo as they mark the Defender of the Fatherland Day at the 'Stalin Line' memorial near the village of Goroshki, Belarus. REUTERS/Vasily Fedosenko Close 20 / 24 
Worshippers kneel and pray in front of the closed doors of the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem's Old City. REUTERS/Amir Cohen Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Worshippers kneel and pray in front of the closed doors of the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem's Old City. REUTERS/Amir Cohen Close 21 / 24 
Olympic Athlete from Russia coach Oleg Znarok is lifted up after Olympic Athletes from Russia defeated Germany in the men's final ice hockey match at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Brian Snyder Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Olympic Athlete from Russia coach Oleg Znarok is lifted up after Olympic Athletes from Russia defeated Germany in the men's final ice hockey match at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Brian Snyder Close 22 / 24 
General view of the torch after it is extinguished and fireworks during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Florian Choblet/Pool Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 General view of the torch after it is extinguished and fireworks during the closing ceremony of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. REUTERS/Florian Choblet/Pool Close 23 / 24 
Participants perform during an event as part of British Council's UK-India Year of Culture inside a college campus in Chennai, India. REUTERS/P. Ravikumar Reuters / Sunday, February 25, 2018 Participants perform during an event as part of British Council's UK-India Year of Culture inside a college campus in Chennai, India. REUTERS/P. Ravikumar Close
